objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD WHISP-APS-MIB::whispRegLost WHISP-APS-MIB::linkLUID i 2 WHISP-APS-MIB::linkPhysAddress s EXAMPLE WHISP-APS-MIB::smSessionTmr t 31536000 WHISP-APS-MIB::lastPowerLevel s EXAMPLE WHISP-APS-MIB::signalToNoiseRatioVertical i 9999 WHISP-APS-MIB::signalToNoiseRatioHorizontal i 9999 WHISP-APS-MIB::adaptRate s EXAMPLE WHISP-APS-MIB::lqiLowDownlinkQualityIndex i 0 WHISP-APS-MIB::lqiLowUplinkQualityIndex i 0

description: LUID number.
variables.name: WHISP-APS-MIB::linkLUID

description: SM session uptime
variables.name: WHISP-APS-MIB::smSessionTmr

description: The last power level of registered SM.
For MIMO radios this is the combined receive power.
variables.name: WHISP-APS-MIB::lastPowerLevel

description: Estimate of the receive signal to noise ratio in dB.
For GenII OFDM and forward.
For MIMO this is the vertical path.
variables.name: WHISP-APS-MIB::signalToNoiseRatioVertical

description: Estimate of the receive signal to noise ratio in dB.
MIMO radios only.
For MIMO this is the horizontal path.
If operating in MIMO-A this will return 0.
variables.name: WHISP-APS-MIB::signalToNoiseRatioHorizontal

description: Downlink adapt rate to registered SM.
variables.name: WHISP-APS-MIB::adaptRate

description: Downlink Quality Index for one minute interval in percentage. 100% is best quality

description: Uplink Quality Index for one minute interval in percentage. 100% is best quality
variables.name: WHISP-APS-MIB::lqiLowUplinkQualityIndex
